original_text: Then he is to take the two goats and present them before the Lord at the entrance to the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 또 그 두 염소를 가지고 회막 문 여호와 앞에 두고

sentences.original_text: Then he is to take the two goats
and present them before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 주 앞에 드려야 합니다

sentences.original_text: at the entrance to the tent of meeting
